title: Sculpting Revenge
description: Compelled by Dave’s fatal encounter with a police officer, sculptor Arianna flies from Florence, Italy to Washington, D.C. She is repulsed by what she thinks may be the cop’s motive for murdering Dave. Arianna hopes to be helped by a pastor, a lawyer and a senator, but their interests in Dave’s death do not align with hers. Mystified and frustrated, Arianna sculpts a statue of Dave to rekindle her romance — and in the process, finds an unlikely helper from her past. Take this journey of love and revenge with Arianna.
author: Mihir Jaiswal
